Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2012 11:50PM Maxerpaws wrote: her2 - positive, but nothing worked - tumors continue to grow.  I continue to try and work full time to keep my life as normal as possible.  That really does help.
Posts.Title: Running Out of Time. Maxerpaws K-Lo

Posts.Content: Maxerpaws wrote: I had breast cancer 6 years ago.  (I thought) I got rid of it and never gave it another thought.  Took Tamoxifin daily.  Aug 18, 2010 I was told I had Stage IV on all my bones and liver.  I have been on so many chemos I have lost count.  I have been put back on Aduamycin/chemo (can't read the doctors writing) but since none of the other chemos have worked, unless this one works, I have 6 - 8 months to live.  I am scared, but still trying to be hopeful.  Has anyone else received this kind of news?  I feel very alone . . . Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Running Out of Time. Maxerpaws K-Lo
